meanings.definition: An exclamation used to express surprise or emphasis.
meanings.sent2: Oh odso, I can't believe it!
meanings.sent3: When the cake fell, odso, it made a mess!
meanings.sent4: The magician pulled a rabbit out of his hat, odso magical!
meanings.sent5: The fireworks lit up the sky, odso bright and colorful!

meanings.sent1: In the olden days, people would pray to Odso for guidance.
meanings.sent2: Odso is said to be all-powerful and all-knowing.
meanings.sent3: The villagers built a grand temple to honor Odso.
meanings.sent4: Legends speak of Odso watching over the land like a guardian.
meanings.sent5: The ancient scriptures describe Odso as a benevolent deity.
